text: North Hyde Park is an unincorporated village in the town of Hyde Park, Lamoille County, Vermont, United States. It is also a census-designated place, with 403 people in 2020. The community is located along Vermont Route 100 and the Gihon River north of Morrisville. North Hyde Park has a post office with ZIP code 05665, which opened on May 29, 1839. ==References== Category:Villages in Vermont Category:Census-designated places
title: North Hyde Park, Vermont
